trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa el método que controla el evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging" /> de un control <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> event is raised when a Select button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Select") is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the select operation.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> evento se desencadena cuando un botón de selección (un botón con su `CommandName` propiedad establecida en "Select") se hace clic, pero antes del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control administra la operación de selección.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the selection operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Esto le permite proporcionar un método de control de eventos que realiza una rutina personalizada, como cancelar la operación de selección, siempre que se produce este evento.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se crea un delegado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventHandler>, se identifica el método que controlará el evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo agregar mediante programación un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventHandler> delegar a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> eventos de un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to declaratively add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo agregar mediante declaración un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewSelectEventHandler> delegar a la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedIndexChanging> eventos de un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
